attributes.agent_name: Motus Ford Airport Park Germiston Used Cars
attributes.description:
Finance can be arranged, Excludes administration, delivery and license registration fees, 160 point quality check, Very neat, Trade-ins accepted, Test drives welcome, Nationwide delivery.

Finance is available with all the major banks as we are approved dealers. Please come and visit our Used Car Manager and our Business Manager, they will be able to arrange a Taylor made Deal structure to match your pocket over a lovely cup of coffee at our Bistro. Trade-ins welcome and we pay top prices for good clean vehicles. First time to finance, our Finance and Insurance Manager will assist you step by step throughout your process. There are great warranty options available for this vehicle and other great products. Should you require further information or you would like to arrange a test drive please do not hesitate to contact us.
attributes.finance_estimate:
Estimated monthly payment is R 13 370.00 over 72 months with 10% deposit of R 75 990.00 at a rate of 12% (PRIME + 3%).

* Please note that these calculations are only estimates and must be confirmed with your finance provider.
attributes.options: ABS, Android Auto, Airbags, Bin lining

attributes.agent_name: Motus Ford Paarden Eiland Used Cars
attributes.description:
2018 VOLKSWAGEN JETTA GP 1.4 TSI COMFORTLINE
This quality used vehicle is at Motus Ford Paarden Eiland, just next to the N1 in Cape Town. We deliver nationwide and will arrange your finance and insurance with ease. We have a full range pre-owned Ford and other popular brands of used vehicles. We would like to give you the best deal on a used car or low mileage demo vehicle.
We also offer value added products such as:
Mechanical Breakdown Warranty
Maintenance and Service Plans
Crystal Fusion Windshield Protection / Reduces Night Glare
Restore it Care – Bodyline and Interior Maintenance
Matrix – Beame Recovery
Smash & Grab Window Protection

attributes.description:
Don't wait, call now to book your test drive...
All our vehicles undergo a Dekra Condition Report and an EXTRA quality check at our workshop for that peace of mind motoring. The one thing we pride ourselves in more than anything is EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE. Come and join our Nissan Parow Family where trust and service are our main focus. We will tailor make a package that will suit your needs. We deal through all major financial institutions and always pride ourselves on giving you the best deal. CALL NOW and one of our experienced and professional Sales Executives will gladly bring the vehicle out to you or welcome you here on our safe and spacious showroom. Contact the Motus Nissan Parow TEAM NOW!

attributes.title: 2020 Kia Picanto 1.2 Street

attributes.description:
Here are some of what the team at Renault Pinetown offers you in making the purchase of your new preowned car a positive and stress free one.
1)	We can tailor make a deal to suit you.
2)	101-point check and road worthy done on all our cars (AA Dekra).
3)	Finance department offering you the best deal from all the major banks.
4)	We also have loads of products to assist you while owning your car. Here are a few:
Service plans, maintenance plans, extended warranty, warranty booster, renew tech, tracking system, crystal fusion and safety film.
Nationwide delivery. All Trade-in's welcome. Finance can be arranged.

attributes.description:
If the city makes you feel young and alive, and you're eager to explore new places, you've found a
soulmate in the new Picanto. Compact on the outside, roomy on the inside, and full of big ideas.
With its dynamic performance and agile manoeuvrability, the Picanto turns a neighbourhood into
its very own playground.
Vehicle comes with complementary smash& grab.

Nationwide delivery. All Trade-in's welcome. Finance can be arranged, Contact us today! Price excludes on the road fees.
